name: Rhythm Roll (HintOfLime)
description:
IMPORTANT: COLORS APPEAR INCORRECT IN WEB PLAYER, OK IN WINDOWS BUILD
Rhythm Roll

A simple game in which you must rotate your dice so the top matches the symbols coming down on you left. Can you make it onto the leaderboard?

Controls
  • WASD or Arrow keys - Rotate dice
Thoughts

I started this game about 4 hours before the jam deadline after coming to the conclusion that the game I had previously been working on was far too ambitious and ultimately just not that fun. So here's something simple instead, full of bugs too of course.
